column5: Just wondering how many guys out there are running with an Otter Monster box on their ATVS  I was wondering how you like them, and also wondering if they would fit a 2015 450 Can-Am.  Im looking at options, and just wanted to see if anyone on here has one.  Thanks

That would have been my #1 choice but the width was too much for what I wanted.  I couldn't fit the kolpin gun boot beside the box.  Ended up buying an all checker plate aluminum box made for ATVs of all places, Home Depot. I found most of the other types were just too floppy or the wrong dimension for what I wanted.   http://www.homedepot.ca/product/32-inch-atv-storage-box-aluminum/997124  Sent you a PM too.
That's big enough for you to climb in..
That's big enough for you to climb in..   Now that,s funny right there.
I rent the basement to Brian
Thanks for the link Fisherman!!  I appreciate it
